ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلْمِيثَٰقَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who fulfil Allah's contract and do not break their agreement;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who fulfil their covenant with God and do not break their agreement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: those who fulfil their covenant with Allah and do not break their compact after firmly confirming it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who fulfill their promise to and covenant with God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who fulfil the pact of Allah, and do not renege on the covenant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who fulfill, the covenant of Allah and break not the trust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who fulfil the promise of Allah and do not break the covenant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who fulfil God's covenant, and break not the compact,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such as keep the pact of Allah, and break not the covenant;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they who are true to their bond with God and never break their covenant;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who fulfil the covenant of Allah, and violate not the bond.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who fulfill Allah’s covenant and do not break the pledge solemnly made,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who fulfil the covenant of Allah and fail not in their plighted word;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who fulfill the Covenant of Allah and break not the Mithaq (bond, treaty, covenant);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who fulfill their promise to Allah and do not break their pledge;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who fulfill the promise to God, and do not violate the agreement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [13:20] such as fulfil God’s covenant, [meaning] the one that was taken from them while they were still atoms — or [meaning] any covenant — and do not break the pact, by abandoning belief, or [religious] obligations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such as keep the pact of Allah) they fulfil the obligations of Allah, (and break not the covenant) they do not refrain from the obligations of Allah;
